## How to use this schedule

- **Lectures:** Mon & Wed (new content)
- **Fridays:** Most weeks include an in-class activity; reviews before exams
- **Homework:** ~10 assignments due Tuesdays via Achieve; lowest 2 dropped; no HW assigned the week before exams
- **LearningCurve:** Due before Monday lectures

**Textbook:** Freedman, Geller & Kaufmann, *Universe* 11th ed (2019)

## Important Dates

- **First class:** Wed Jan 21, 2026
- **Module 1 Exam:** Mon Mar 2 (Chapters 1-8)
- **Spring Break:** Mar 27 – Apr 5 (no class)
- **Module 2 Exam:** Mon Apr 20 (Chapters 16-21)
- **Last class:** Wed May 6
- **Final Exam:** Fri May 8, 10:30 AM – 12:30 PM (Comprehensive)
